known_issues: Leaflet map becomes black when entering fullscreen mode.

existing_features.title: Fix the Leaflet map so that when the user enters fullscreen mode, the base map tiles remain visible (the map must not render as a black background) and the map correctly resizes to the fullscreen viewport.

Update the map fullscreen implementation to ensure Leaflet receives a correct container size after fullscreen changes by triggering a resize/invalidate after the fullscreen layout is applied (e.g., after React state-driven class/style updates) and ensuring the map container has a real fullscreen height/width while in fullscreen.
Adjust/extend the existing fullscreen-related CSS so the Leaflet container and its panes reliably render in fullscreen (including correct stacking context) without hiding the tile layer.

projectName: Fix Leaflet map turning black in fullscreen
